00011 W.namespaces = {};

00017 W.check_namespace = function(){
00018     var newNames = '';
00019     // BUG: THis thing doesn't work in IE
00020     for(var i in window){
00021         // search W.names string
00022         if(!this.names.match(i +',')){  // mask out default namespaces under 'window'
00023             if(this.namespaces[i]){
00024                 if(!isSame(this.namespaces[i], window[i])){
00025                     mesg('namespace confliction detected.', 'namespace: '+ i);
00026                     break;
00027                 }//else alert('namespace, '+ i +' has conflicted.\nregistered:'+ this.namespaces[i] +'\nnew:'+ window[i]);
00028             }else{
00029                 newNames += i;
00030                 newNames += ',';
00031                 this.namespaces[i] = window[i];
00032             }
00033         }//else alert(i +' - exist');
00034     }
00035     if(newNames != '')
00036         mesg('namespace introduced', 'new namespaces: '+ newNames);
00037 
00038     function mesg(title, message){alert('[WEDNUS] '+ title +':\n\n'+ message);};
00039     function isSame(source, target){
00040         if(typeof source != typeof target){
00041             _alert(source, target);
00042             return false;
00043         }
00044         // base case
00045         if(typeof source != 'object'){
00046             if(source +'' != target +'')
00047                _alert(source, target, 'defferent value');
00048             return source +'' == target +'';
00049         }
00050         // n-cases
00051         for(var i in source){
00052             if(typeof source[i] == 'object')
00053                 return isSame(source[i], target[i]);
00054             if(source[i] +'' != target[i] +''){
00055                 _alert(source[i], target[i], 'defferent value');
00056                 return false;
00057             }
00058         }
00059         return true;
00060 
00061         // for debugging
00062         function _alert(a, b, mesg){
00063             alert('reason: '+ mesg +'\n\n[source]\n'+ a +'\n\n[target]\n'+ b);
00064         };
00065     };
00066 };
